item.title: Two Trump crypto trades are coming into conflict and could prove a headwind to the bitcoin rally
item.description: Bitcoin investors could suffer a more turbulent quarter as two opposing Trump crypto trades come into conflict.

item.title: Where to find opportunity in commercial real estate as rates climb, according to experts
item.description: The 'doom and gloom' in commercial real estate has been pushed aside, said Janus Henderson's John Kerschner.

item.title: Insurance stocks sell off sharply as potential losses tied to LA wildfires increase
item.description: Allstate, Chubb and Travelers are the most exposed carriers to insured losses in the wildfires, according to JPMorgan.

item.title: The dollar keeps going higher. Investors are using these ETFs to get a piece of the rally
item.description: Two funds that serve as bets on a strong dollar have seen strong investor interest in recent weeks.

item.title: This old blue chip is forming a classic bearish-to-bullish reversal, according to Carter Worth
item.description: The chart analyst breaks down Whirlpool.
